Posts.Content: jeanjean_chang wrote: I just got my post-surgery path report. The doctor says the tumor is 3.2 cm and clear cut.  I am negative for the 3 sentinel lymph nodes taken from my armpit.However they do find a postive internal mammomary( not sure if it is the correct spelling)  lymph node. It's under the chestwall.  Even it's only one positive. I am sentenced to be Stage IIIa.  I just cannot accept this. Does anybody has the same situation like me?  Dx 3/4/2009, IDC, 3cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, 1/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Am I stage II or Stage III jeanjean_chang nelia48
